name: Smart Ways To Root
description:
You've seen the video - now the phone roots of those not careful users are in your hands.Enjoy almost 20 interesting mini-games as you attempt to get access to root of their phonesTry game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe in internet cafe with free wi-fi.

 A message from Mr.Hacker

Controlls

Tap, swipe, hold and drag, pinch - do it all the time.  It works both on PC and on phones.

Also check GGJ2023 page https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/smart-ways-root-2
